summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate history record for Leonardo Fernandez, detailing his cell/bed assignments and transfers across multiple facilities from April 2019 to August 2021. The document shows a pattern of frequent moves between different housing units.

persons.name: Leonardo Fernandez
persons.context: The subject of the inmate history record, showing his movement through various prison housing units and beds over a period from 2019 to 2021.

events.title: Inmate housing assignment
events.description: Leonardo Fernandez assigned to House G/Range 10/Bed 775L at NYM facility.

events.title: Inmate transfer to administrative detention
events.description: Fernandez moved to House R/Range 01/Bed 001L, then to administrative detention (AD) housing.

events.title: Multiple facility transfers
events.description: Fernandez transferred between BRO facility housing units including administrative detention beds.

events.title: Transfer to THA facility
events.description: Fernandez moved from MA facility to THA facility housing units.

events.title: Current housing assignment
events.description: Document shows Fernandez's current assignment as of August 2021 in THA facility.

keyFacts: Leonardo Fernandez was a federal inmate with Bureau of Prisons registration number 86824-054.
The document tracks his movements through at least five different prison facilities from April 2019 to August 2021.
Fernandez was frequently moved between different housing units and beds, including periods in administrative detention (AD).
The record shows he was housed in facilities designated NYM, BRO, THA, OKL, and MA.
As of August 2, 2021, he was currently assigned to THA M02-029L House M/Range 02/Bed 029L.
